newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Gulf rig unchanged at 163 in week.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Gulf rig unchanged at 163 in week.

text.p: There were 163 rigs under contract in the U.S. Gulf as of August 23, unchanged from from the prior week, Offshore Data Services said.
The utilization rate for rigs working in the Gulf, based on a total fleet of 181, was 90.1 percent.
The number of working rigs in European/Mediterranean dipped by one this week, with 105 rigs under contract out of a total fleet of 105, a utilization rate of 100 percent.
The worldwide rig count fell by one to 555 out of a total fleet of 608, making the utilization rate 91.3 percent.
